evaluation:

The tags listed (CC, IN, JJR/RBS) are similar to those in the task description, but the descriptions (e.g., "Copular (connecting)" for CC) are inaccurate according to the provided task description. - CC as "Coordinating conjunction"

Moreover, there should not be combinations like "JJR/RBS" as separate entries according to the task description.

The output also contains more text than what is expected, as only a part of speech tag should have been returned.
